Test Name: Rapid Plasma Reagin (RPR) with Reflex to Treponema pallidum Particle Agglutination (TP-PA)
Purpose: To detect syphilis by screening serum with RPR and confirming reactive results with TP-PA.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube (container not explicitly specified in SOP)
Equipment: RPR test kit, TP-PA kit, pipettes, timer, rotator/shaker, centrifuge, incubator
